languages.text: Конвейерная лента, засыпанная каменной крошкой вперемешку с обломками явно рукотворной природы. Судя по ржавчине на механических частях, устройство остановилось и простаивает без дела уже очень давно.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Конвейерная лента, за которой сервиторы бесприрывно сортируют добытые ископаемые. Сейчас конвейер остановился и сервиторы стоят без дела.

languages.text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.
languages.original_text: Конвейерная лента, засыпанная каменной крошкой вперемешку с обломками явно рукотворной природы. Судя по ржавчине на механических частях, устройство остановилось и простаивает без дела уже очень давно.

traits.locale_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

languages.text: 传送带上堆满了碎石块与人造物品的碎片。机械部件锈迹斑斑，这台机器应该已经闲置了很长时间。
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: 传送带上堆满了碎石块与人造物品的碎片。机械部件锈迹斑斑，这台机器应该已经闲置了很长时间。

languages.text: Una cinta transportadora cubierta de diversos fragmentos de piedra y de objetos creados por personas. El óxido de sus componentes mecánicos demuestra que lleva mucho tiempo detenida.
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: Una cinta transportadora cubierta de diversos fragmentos de piedra y de objetos creados por personas. El óxido de sus componentes mecánicos demuestra que lleva mucho tiempo detenida.

languages.text: 石の破片や人工物の欠片が散在する汚れたベルトコンベア。機械部品の錆は、この機械がかなり長期間放置されていたことを示している。
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: 石の破片や人工物の欠片が散在する汚れたベルトコンベア。機械部品の錆は、この機械がかなり長期間放置されていたことを示している。

languages.text: Un tapis roulant recouvert d'un mélange d'éclats rocheux et de fragments d'objets d'origine humaine. La rouille visible sur les composants mécaniques indique que cette machine est à l'arrêt depuis très longtemps.
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: Un tapis roulant recouvert d'un mélange d'éclats rocheux et de fragments d'objets d'origine humaine. La rouille visible sur les composants mécaniques indique que cette machine est à l'arrêt depuis très longtemps.

languages.text: Ein Förderband mit einer Mischung aus Steinsplittern und Bruchstücken von Menschen gefertigter Objekte. Der Rost auf den mechanischen Komponenten lässt vermuten, dass diese Maschine sehr lange nicht in Betrieb war.
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: Ein Förderband mit einer Mischung aus Steinsplittern und Bruchstücken von Menschen gefertigter Objekte. Der Rost auf den mechanischen Komponenten lässt vermuten, dass diese Maschine sehr lange nicht in Betrieb war.

languages.text: Bir konveyör bandının üzeri, taş kırıntıları ve insan yapımı nesnelerin parçalarıyla dolu. Mekanik aksamların üzerinde tutan pas, makinenin çok uzun süredir atıl durduğunu işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: A conveyor belt littered with a mixture of stone chippings and fragments of human-made items. The rust on the mechanical components indicates that this machine has stood idle for a very long time.

traits.locale_text: Üzeri taş kırıntıları ve insan yapımı bir şeylerin parçalarıyla dolu bir taşıma kayışı var. Mekanik bileşenlerin üzerindeki pas, makinenin çok uzun süredir atıl durduğuna işaret ediyor.
